private IDBConnection initDB(String dbUrl,
                             String dbUser,
                             String dbPass,
                             String dbType,
                             String dbClass)
                      throws InstantiationException,
                             IllegalAccessException,
                             ClassNotFoundException
Setup database connection

Parameters:
dbUrl - url of server
dbUser - username to connect with
dbPass - password to connect with
dbType - database type
dbClass - jdbc connection class
Returns:
the database connection
Throws:
InstantiationException - could not instantiate
IllegalAccessException - not authorized
